title: Exploring the Ancient Root of Evil Lies - Everything the World tells you is either BS or propaganda.
description:
Reading through Jacques Ellul’s book “Propaganda: the formation of men’s attitudes”, I compare the concepts not only to our world today, but to the way that lies and propaganda have shaped our history. 

The propaganda knee jerk

https://youtu.be/DvqDvxIzjM8

Byrne Power’s blog on propaganda 

https://theanadromist.wordpress.com

The “youth friendly” version of John Vervaeke’s talk on BS

https://youtu.be/ROUe6LdQ7y0

The full lecture unedited 

https://youtu.be/Lhl51bZQlM8


Michael Heiser & the unseen realm 

www.Drmsh.com
